title: Scheduled For Adrainment
description: Karen brings the case against her husband, Matt. Part of their property has a pasture that slopes downward. This creates a low spot that fills with a foot of water during certain times of the year. Karen calls this area the “frog bog.” Matt wants to fill it in, but Karen wants to leave the bog alone. Who’s right? Who’s wrong?
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Judge John Hodgman, MaximumFun.org)
